projects.title: CommenceIO Blog
projects.description_short: Open Blog Platform for Programming Tutorials
projects.description_long: CommenceIO is an open blogging platform for Web and Software development tutorials. The goal of the project is to pool web related instructions and helpful into a single website. The site is open to all at any skill level. From amateur to engineer, the website hopes to attract those who want to share their about programming.

projects.title: Movie Search
projects.description_long: Example Front-End application for displaying movie information. Using AngulaJS and JS libraries to create a better user experience.

projects.title: Patron Career Staffing
projects.description_long: Patron Career Staffing is a staffing agency in the Greater Toronto Area. Their website needed a landing page, company details and agent registration and contact forms. Considering SEO and client specifications, WordPress was the best choice for their needs.
